snippet: With three weeks until the Democratic mayoral primary, William C. Thompson Jr. is hoping to pivot the conversation to New York City’s schools with a new television advertisement.
abstract: With three weeks until the Democratic mayoral primary, William C. Thompson Jr. is hoping to pivot the conversation to New York City’s schools with a new television advertisement.

headline.main: The Ad Campaign: Thompson Turns Attention to Education
headline.print_headline: The Ad Campaign: Thompson Turns Attention to Education
